ProjectTitle: National Building LCA Data Accelerator EU LIFE
InitialFeedbackHistory:
25/02/2025
This DMP is still fairly generic / draft, and indiactes that regular updates will be done to project datasets and their management as the project progresses. It is then best to included a schedule for regular updates of the DMP, e.g. annually.

Data repositories are key to making research data FAIR. Therefore it's best to indicateb in 4.2.1. which data repositories are available to use, e.g. Zenodo, KU Leuven RDR.
label: good with suggestions
